Name: Boomer Rampage
About the game: The Game Boomer Rampage is a puzzle game in which we control the boomers rocket hand. Our task is to destroy the target, avoiding enemies, traps and walls in all the 90 levels. Features - 2 Difficulties (normal, hard). - 90 Levels. - Steam Achievements. - Steam Leaderboards. Controls Space bar = Shoot rocket hand. WASD or Arrow Keys = Change direction of the rocket hand. H, J, K = Use skills.
